goals__remit:
Ardanuy Ingeniería, S.A. is an engineering consulting firm specialised in studies, designs, works supervision, and Independent Safety Assessments (ISA), Due Diligences; and technical assistance for: Railways (High Speed, Conventional, Freight, Metro, Tramway, Cable Car), roadways (motorways, highways, BRT, roads, etc.) buildings (architecture, installations, etc.), electrical engineering and telecommunications. .  
 
MAIN INFORMATION  
 
The company was founded in December 1992 and is made up of a permanent team of more than 150 people (the majority engineers). The sales volume exceeded 12 Million Euros in 2015 and since the beginning until now has carried out over 1000 projects.  
 
INTERNATIONAL ACTIVITY 
 
Ardanuy Ingeniería, S.A. carries out its main activity in Spain from its offices in Madrid, Barcelona, Valencia, Seville, and Tenerife, and in other countries like the Americas: Argentina, Chile, Cuba, USA, Colombia, Mexico, Peru, Bolivia, Paraguay, Puerto Rico, Panama, Nicaragua, Uruguay…Africa: Algeria, Egypt, Morocco, Mozambique, South Africa, Cameroon…Asia: Saudi Arabia, India, Vietnam, and Europe: France, UK, Poland, Romania, Hungary, Bulgaria, Latvia, Lithuania, Czech Republic, Portugal, Croatia…  
 
Currently, Ardanuy Ingeniería S.A. has subsidiary companies in Lithuania (UAB Ardanuy Baltic), Colombia (Ardanuy Colombia SAS), India (Ardanuy India PLT), USA (Ardanuy Engineering Corporation), Algeria (Ardanuy Algerie), Panama (Ardanuy Panamá S.A.).  
 
ACCREDITATION OF QUALITY AND ENVIRONMENT  
 
Ardanuy Ingeniería, S.A. has ISO 9001 quality certification and ISO 14001 international environmental standard, both accredited by Lloyd´s Register. The company is also an ENAC Accredited Inspection Entity for railway safety assessments (ISA), conforming to the UNE EN ISO/IEC 17020:2012 standard criteria.
relevant_communication: Somos miembros de la asociación UNIFE (UNIFE is representing the European rail manufacturing industry in Brussels since 1992) y participamos en sus actividades
